nycTheatreExcerpt: Let's start with Camelot. A classic musical from 1960 that last saw a revival on Broadway in 1980, many were anticipating good things from the Lincoln Center's newest re-imagining, following director Bartlet Sherr's successes with The King and I and My Fair Lady.
